name: Robots, lasers and speed
description:
Robots, lasers and speed

Fast paced VR Platformer with Jump-pack (not to be confused with a jetpack), Lasers, Flamethrowers, Robots that shoots energy blasts, Robot that shoots rockets, Saws, Bottomless pits and Mines

try also: Davvi https://amateurhourent.itch.io/davvi
